meanings.definition: Used as a casual greeting or farewell.
meanings.sent2: She waved and said ciao as she left.
meanings.sent4: The sun said ciao to the sky as it set.
meanings.sent5: With a cheerful ciao, he started his day.

meanings.sent2: They exchanged hugs and said ciao.
meanings.sent4: The old year said ciao as the new one arrived.
meanings.sent5: With a heavy heart, she whispered her final ciao.
meanings.sent6: After a long chat, they bid ciao to each other.

meanings.sent2: He opened the door and greeted them with a ciao.
meanings.sent3: Ciao! Nice to meet you, new friend.
meanings.sent4: The morning greeted the world with a bright ciao.
meanings.sent5: With a warm ciao, she introduced herself to the group.
